Building.Name: Statue
Building.Description: At the beginning of each productive season, if you have the same number on all your dice, you may reroll one of them.

Building.Name: Chapel
Building.Description: At the beginning of each productive season, if the total of your dice is 7 or less, you may reroll all of them.

Building.Name: Church
Building.Description: +0 in battle (becomes +1 vs. Demons)

Building.Name: Cathedral
Building.Description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra VP for every 2 goods you own.

Building.Name: Inn
Building.Description: At the end of each Summer you get a "+2" token.

Building.Name: Market
Building.Description: Once per season, you may influence an Advisor whose value is one point higher or lower than the sum of the dice you are using.

Building.Name: Farms
Building.Description: During each productive season, you roll one extra (white) dice. Penalty: -1 in battle.

Building.Name: Merchants' Guild
Building.Description: At the beginning of each productive season, before rolling dice, you get 1 gold.

Building.Name: Guard Tower
Building.Description: +1 in battle.

Building.Name: Blacksmith
Building.Description: +1 in battle.

Building.Name: Barracks
Building.Description: You pay only one good to recruit soldiers in phase 7.

Building.Name: Wizards' Guild
Building.Description: +2 in battle.

Building.Name: Palisade
Building.Description: +1 in battle (becomes +2 vs. Zombies)

Building.Name: Stable
Building.Description: You get an additional soldier when you influence an Advisor who gives you at least one soldier.

Building.Name: Stone Wall
Building.Description: +1 in battle. In addition, in battle you win draws.

Building.Name: Fortress
Building.Description: +1 in battle. In addition, when you win a battle you get 1 VP on top of the normal rewards.

Building.Name: Barricade
Building.Description: +0 in battle. (becomes +1 vs. Goblins)

Building.Name: Crane
Building.Description: You pay one gold less when building in III and IV column.

Building.Name: Town Hall
Building.Description: At the end of each productive season, you may pay a "+2" token or one good (any kind) to get 1 VP (only once per season).

Building.Name: Embassy
Building.Description: At the end of each productive season you get 1 VP.
